title: RITOOOOOOO?!?!?!??!?!?!?
body: I JUST WENT INTO A GAME AND WAS LIKE "OH LETS USE THE ESSENCE COLLECTER WARD BECAUSE I LIKE IT" I GO INTO THE WARD SKIN SELECTION. IT IS NOT THERE. WHY ISN'T IT THERE. I NEED MY WARDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD! WHAT HAPPENED RIOT GAMES???

replies.body: The wards are still on your account, but there's an issue going around where most players aren't able to see the essence collector ward anymore. It's actually happening to myself as well xD! We're still getting that worked out, but rest assured that it's still on your account even if you don't see it!
